channel.title: How to add monster..someone help me please?
channel.description: :confused: does anyone know how to add monsters?

item.title: How to add monster..someone help me please?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

hmm i recall deleting shops and adding new ones as the first thing i did with my server … you know …

spawn = 555	2796	3180	0	3252	3421	3252	3421	2	Weapon/Ammy Shop Keeper

else if (NPCID == 555) { //Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //Weapon/Ammy Shop }

and last but not least

shop = 1	weapons/ammy						1	1	4151	5000	5698	5000	4718	5000	7158	5000	6585	1000	6735	100	6737	100	3751	100	1163	15	1127	15	1079	15	1093	15	1201	15	3842	1000	7462	1000	3105	1000	1153	15	1115	15	1067	15	1191	15	2368	1

and yes you’re absolutely right it is the walktype …

theres a great shop example for you too dark mess with the coords

Read full topic
item.source: How to add monster..someone help me please?

item.title: How to add monster..someone help me please?
item.dc:creator: @P_O0_00_Ned P O0 00 Ned
item.description:
@P_O0_00_Ned wrote:

spawn = 2745	3104	3933	0	3100	3925	3112	3941	2	Jad

I made the range how i wanted it but it still wont move, if its something to do with the walk type what should it be?

Sorry, stealing your topic a bit here

item.title: How to add monster..someone help me please?
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:3, topic:114413”]ok seriously learn to code … “autospawn.cfg” ring any bells ? open it omg!!! monsters!! “wee! but wait whats range … OMG SUM1 HELP ME!!!111” range is the zone the monster can walk in if you make them able to walk around.[/quote] Dude, you probably didn’t know at one stage…

Read full topic
